attributes.action: Allow ONLY the quiet/ Low-noise labelled fireworks to be sold, HELP anxious dogs
attributes.background: So many dogs are suffering dramatically and unnecessarily especially rescues that have been through enough fear. We now have low noise fireworks available in certain stores therefore all loud ones should be discontinued in every store and stock the quiet ones only in replacement

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622900
